title: Linking Managerial Coaching with Learning: Growth Strategies Through Team/Personal Reflection

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Strengthening team collaboration and individual reflection activities in a virtual enterprise environment using VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners apply executive coaching techniques to analyze team project issues, write weekly reflective journals, and enhance self-directed learning competencies.
Learners perform team-based data analysis tasks in VR simulations and refine/optimize mathematical modeling strategies based on peer feedback.
Through four weeks of team coaching sessions, learners lead team debriefing meetings and create individual reflective portfolios to quantitatively assess learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
